data.eml:eml: Two new species of Ve i g a i a Oudemans (Acari: Veigaiidae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bhattacharyya, Asit K. (2006): Two new species of Ve i g a i a Oudemans (Acari: Veigaiidae) from India. Zootaxa 1329: 29-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174191
